name: Software as a Service Management as a Service
tagline: Because SaaS shouldn't be a HaaSle
body:
### Software as a Service Management as a Service.

Software as a Service is a great service. Businesses can easily select IT solutions that, by being prebuilt, carry a lower risk of failure than traditional IT. They're quicker to get started with, and the cost of experimentation is low.
But businesses often find that after the initial blush of success, costs of Software as a Service Services often spiral out of control.

At Saasmass.com we aim to fix that. Our Software as a Service Management Services serve you services to manage you Software and Services.

We guarantee that our solution the SaasMaaS Services Management Server will save you money. We're so sure of this that for a limited time only, our SaaSMaaS SMS Service comes with free SaaSMaaS Services Management Server Management Server so you can see exactly how much we're saving you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
